name: 亨特·琼斯
introduction: Hunter Jones was born on December 03, 2007, the youngest member of the family. Not long after his sister began working in the industry he started to follow in her footsteps quickly booking campaigns for big name companies such as The Children's Place, Joe Fresh, and Toys R Us.Since then Hunter has gone on to appear in numerous commercials including spots for Apple, Cheerios and J.Crew, and at age five became a member of SAG-AFTRA. He continues to shoot campaigns for various companies and in September 2013 he was one of the few selected non-celebrity children to take part in the Kids Rock Fashion Show at Grand Central Station, which led to an appearance on WPIX11 Morning News the following morning to show off the latest back to school trends.When not acting and modeling Hunter loves to spend time with his family, especially big sister Elladia. He enjoys school, playing with friends and takes Karate.
